product_name: Big Agnes Bitter Springs UL 2 Tent
long_description: This ultralight, trekking-pole-supported tent offers spacious 2-person, 3-season protection for backpacking with a mesh body, single door and oversized vestibule that keeps gear dry outside the tent.
short_description: This ultralight, trekking-pole-supported tent offers spacious 2-person, 3-season protection for backpacking with a mesh body, single door and oversized vestibule that keeps gear dry outside the tent.
